name: open-arc-extension-and-paste-clipboard
title: Open Arc Extension  and Paste Clipboard
description: A script to open a specific Arc extension page and paste clipboard content
author: kuncong

commands.name: index
commands.title: Run Script
commands.description: Template for running a script without any view

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
